channel.title: Serial port on Densha de GO! controller documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Serial port on Densha de GO! controller documentation

item.title: Master Controller (PC)
item.description: Overview Name Master Controller (PC) Release date March 4, 1998 Serial code VOK-00105 Notes Supported software (WIP) Software Support Notes Train Simulator (PC) Native Many entries require companion software to use the controller. Train Simulator + Densha de GO!: Tokyu Line (Sony PlayStation 2) Native Requires official USB adapter. Set to Type D. Train Simulator PLUS (PC) Native Train Simulator Real: THE Keihin Electric Express Railway (Sony PlayStation 2) Native Requires official USB adapter.

item.title: Master Controller II (PC)
item.description: Overview Name Master Controller II (PC) Release date December 17, 1999 Serial code VOK-00106 Notes Supported software (WIP) Software Support Notes Train Simulator (PC) Native Many entries require companion software to use the controller. Train Simulator + Densha de GO!: Tokyu Line (Sony PlayStation 2) Native Requires official USB adapter. Set power to 4 and brake to 5. Train Simulator PLUS (PC) Native Train Simulator Real: THE Keihin Electric Express Railway (Sony PlayStation 2) Native Requires official USB adapter.
